structure.unit: PUBLIC LAWS IN FORCE -- COURT RULES

law.catch_line: Decisions of English courts -- When authority.
law.text: The decisions of the courts of Great Britain rendered since July 4, 1776, shall not be of binding authority in the courts of Kentucky.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2418.
